typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	sourceConnectionSecretName as string,
	sinkConnectionStringSecretName as string,
	sourceObjectName as string,
	sinkObjectName as string,
	dataFactoryName as string,
	dataFactoryPipelineName as string,
	dataFactoryPipelineRunId as string,
	truncateTablePriorToCopy as boolean
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> readFromAzureBlobSingleCSV
readFromAzureBlobSingleCSV derive({__sourceConnectionStringSecretName} = $sourceConnectionSecretName,
		{__sinkConnectionStringSecretName} = $sinkConnectionStringSecretName,
		{__sourceObjectName} = $sourceObjectName,
		{__sinkObjectName} = $sinkObjectName,
		{__dataFactoryName} = $dataFactoryName,
		{__dataFactoryPipelineName} = $dataFactoryPipelineName,
		{__dataFactoryPipelineRunId} = $dataFactoryPipelineRunId) ~> EnrichWithRuntimeMetadata
EnrichWithRuntimeMetadata sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table') ~> WriteToAzureSqlTable

resources.name: [concat(parameters('dataFactoryName'), '/Azure Blob Single CSV to Azure SQL Table Copy Pipeline')]

activities.name: Copy Blob Single CSV to Azure SQL Table

resources.name: [concat(parameters('dataFactoryName'), '/Azure Blob Single CSV to Azure SQL Table Data Flow Pipeline')]

activities.name: Copy Blob Single CSV to Azure SQL Table

sinkObjectName.value:
'@{concat('[', 
activity('Find or Create Sink Table').output.firstRow.azureSqlDatabaseTableSchemaName, 
'].[', activity('Find or Create Sink Table').output.firstRow.azureSqlDatabaseTableTableName, ']')}'

ifTrueActivities.name: Truncate Sink Table Prior to Copy

value.value:
@{concat(
   'TRUNCATE TABLE [', 
   activity('Find or Create Sink Table').output.firstRow.azureSqlDatabaseTableSchemaName, 
   '].[', 
   activity('Find or Create Sink Table').output.firstRow.azureSqlDatabaseTableTableName, 
   ']'
)}

resources.name: [concat(parameters('dataFactoryName'), '/Azure SQL Table to Blob Single CSV Copy Pipeline')]

activities.name: Copy Azure SQL Table to Blob Single CSV

resources.name: [concat(parameters('dataFactoryName'), '/Azure SQL Table to Blob Single CSV Data Flow Pipeline')]

activities.name: Copy Sql Database Table To Blob Single CSV Data Flow

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	sourceConnectionSecretName as string,
	sinkConnectionStringSecretName as string,
	sourceObjectName as string,
	sinkObjectName as string,
	dataFactoryName as string,
	dataFactoryPipelineName as string,
	dataFactoryPipelineRunId as string,
	truncateTablePriorToCopy as boolean,
	sinkObjectNameNoPath as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> readFromAzureSqlDatabase
readFromAzureSqlDatabase derive({__sourceConnectionStringSecretName} = $sourceConnectionSecretName,
		{__sinkConnectionStringSecretName} = $sinkConnectionStringSecretName,
		{__sourceObjectName} = $sourceObjectName,
		{__sinkObjectName} = $sinkObjectName,
		{__dataFactoryName} = $dataFactoryName,
		{__dataFactoryPipelineName} = $dataFactoryPipelineName,
		{__dataFactoryPipelineRunId} = $dataFactoryPipelineRunId) ~> enrichWithRuntimeMetadata
enrichWithRuntimeMetadata sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[($sinkObjectNameNoPath)],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> writeToAzureBlobSingleCSV
